Ice.name: Ice
Ice.description: The Ice element is associated with control and adaptability, capable of slowing down enemies or creating defensive barriers.

Tier 1.name: Frostbite
Tier 1.description: Inflict your target with a freezing touch.
Tier 1.effect: Slows down the enemy's movement by 10%.

Tier 2.name: Icy Fortress
Tier 2.description: Using Ice and Earth elements, create a protective ice barrier.
Tier 2.effect: Grants temporary invulnerability to the user.

Tier 3.name: Glacial Eruption
Tier 3.description: Combining the Ice, Water and Earth elements, summon a glacial eruption.
Tier 3.effect: Deals AoE damage and freezes enemies in place.

Electricity.name: Electricity
Electricity.description: The Electricity element is associated with speed and precision, offering high single-target damage and interrupting enemies.

Tier 1.name: Static Shock
Tier 1.description: Deliver a quick electrical jolt to your target.
Tier 1.effect: Deals minor electric damage and interrupts enemy casting.

Tier 2.name: Chain Lightning
Tier 2.description: Using Electricity and Air elements, unleash a chain of electrical currents.
Tier 2.effect: Deals moderate damage to multiple targets.

Tier 3.name: Thunderstorm
Tier 3.description: Combining the Electricity, Water and Air elements, summon a raging thunderstorm.
Tier 3.effect: Deals major electric damage to all enemies and has a chance to stun.

Metal.name: Metal
Metal.description: The Metal element is associated with defense and resilience, capable of creating metallic barriers or bladed weapons.

Tier 1.name: Iron Clad
Tier 1.description: Fortify your armor with a layer of metal.

Tier 2.name: Blade Dance
Tier 2.description: Using Metal and Air elements, summon blades that whirl around you.
Tier 2.effect: Deals moderate damage to nearby enemies.

Tier 3.name: Impenetrable Fortress
Tier 3.description: Combining the Metal, Earth and Fire elements, create an impenetrable metallic barrier.
Tier 3.effect: Grants immunity to physical damage for a short duration.

Wood.name: Wood
Wood.description: The Wood element is associated with growth and support, capable of healing allies or entangling enemies.

Tier 1.name: Budding Sprout
Tier 1.description: Summon a small plant that provides minor healing.
Tier 1.effect: Heals an ally for a small amount.

Tier 2.name: Vine Snare
Tier 2.description: Using Wood and Earth elements, entangle enemies in a snare of vines.
Tier 2.effect: Restrains the target and deals minor damage over time.

Tier 3.name: Forest's Embrace
Tier 3.description: Combining the Wood, Water and Earth elements, surround allies in a protective grove.
Tier 3.effect: Provides a healing over time effect and minor damage resistance to all allies in the area.

Poison.name: Poison
Poison.description: The Poison element is associated with damage over time and debuffs, providing skills that gradually weaken enemies.

Tier 1.name: Poison Dart
Tier 1.description: Launch a poisonous dart at your enemy.
Tier 1.effect: Inflicts poison status, causing minor damage over time.

Tier 2.name: Toxic Cloud
Tier 2.description: Using Poison and Air elements, create a cloud of toxic gas.
Tier 2.effect: Deals moderate damage over time and reduces enemy accuracy.

Tier 3.name: Venomous Bite
Tier 3.description: Combining Poison, Water and Earth elements, unleash a venomous attack.
Tier 3.effect: Inflicts multiple debuffs and significant damage over time.

Ink.name: Ink
Ink.description: The Ink element is associated with obscuring vision and controlling the battlefield, offering utility and area denial.

Tier 1.name: Ink Splash
Tier 1.description: Splash ink at a target area.

Tier 2.name: Dark Mist
Tier 2.description: Using Ink and Air elements, create a mist that obscures vision.
Tier 2.effect: Grants stealth to allies and blinds enemies.

Tier 3.name: Abyssal Zone
Tier 3.description: Combining Ink, Water and Shadow elements, create a zone of impenetrable darkness.
Tier 3.effect: Negates all enemy actions in the area for a short time.

Sound.name: Sound
Sound.description: The Sound element is associated with disruption and manipulation, offering skills that can interrupt and disorient enemies.

Tier 1.name: Sonic Wave
Tier 1.description: Emit a wave of disruptive sound.
Tier 1.effect: Interrupts enemy actions and causes minor damage.

Tier 2.name: Harmonic Resonance
Tier 2.description: Using Sound and Light elements, create a harmonious aura.

Tier 3.name: Symphony of Destruction
Tier 3.description: Combining Sound, Fire and Electricity elements, unleash a devastating sonic attack.
Tier 3.effect: Deals major damage and disorients all enemies.

Magnetism.name: Magnetism
Magnetism.description: The Magnetism element is associated with attraction and repulsion, offering control and positioning capabilities.

Tier 2.name: Iron Shield
Tier 2.description: Using Magnetism and Metal elements, create a magnetic shield.

Tier 3.name: Polar Vortex
Tier 3.description: Combining Magnetism, Ice and Electricity elements, create a polar vortex.
Tier 3.effect: Attracts all enemies and deals significant damage.

Nanotechnology.name: Nanotechnology
Nanotechnology.description: The Nanotechnology element is associated with precise manipulation and control, offering unparalleled utility and adaptability.

Tier 1.name: Nano Heal
Tier 1.effect: Restores a moderate amount of health over time.

Tier 2.name: Nano Shield
Tier 2.description: Using Nanotechnology and Metal elements, create a nanobot shield.
Tier 2.effect: Absorbs all forms of damage for a short duration.

Tier 3.name: Swarm Attack
Tier 3.description: Combining Nanotechnology, Electricity, and Poison elements, release a swarm of attack nanobots.
Tier 3.effect: Deals major damage and applies multiple debuffs.

Spirit.name: Spirit
Spirit.description: The Spirit element is associated with life force and ethereal energy, offering skills that manipulate the spiritual realm.

Tier 1.name: Spirit Bond
Tier 1.description: Form a spiritual link with an ally.
Tier 1.effect: Shares healing and buffs between linked individuals.

Tier 2.name: Ethereal Gate
Tier 2.description: Using Spirit and Air elements, open a gateway to the spirit realm.
Tier 2.effect: Allows for quick travel between two points on the map.

Tier 3.name: Soul Nova
Tier 3.description: Combining Spirit, Light, and Shadow elements, unleash a burst of spiritual energy.
Tier 3.effect: Heals allies and deals significant damage to enemies.

Chaos.name: Chaos
Chaos.description: The Chaos element is associated with unpredictability and change, offering skills that can create random effects.

Tier 1.name: Chaos Bolt
Tier 1.description: Launch a bolt of chaotic energy.
Tier 1.effect: Randomly chooses an effect from any other Tier 1 skill.

Tier 2.name: Warp Reality
Tier 2.description: Using Chaos and Time elements, distort the fabric of reality.
Tier 2.effect: Randomizes the positions of all units on the battlefield.

Tier 3.name: Pandemonium
Tier 3.description: Combining Chaos, Fire, and Ice elements, unleash pure chaos.
Tier 3.effect: Creates random areas of effect with different elemental damages.

Gravity.name: Gravity
Gravity.description: The Gravity element is associated with control and force, offering skills that manipulate the gravitational field.

Tier 1.name: Gravitational Pull
Tier 1.description: Attract objects or enemies toward you.

Tier 2.name: Gravity Well
Tier 2.description: Using Gravity and Earth elements, create a gravitational sinkhole.
Tier 2.effect: Enemies are pulled into the center and receive moderate damage.

Tier 3.name: Black Hole
Tier 3.description: Combining Gravity, Space, and Time elements, summon a black hole.
Tier 3.effect: Sucks in all enemies and deals massive damage over time.

Time.name: Time
Time.description: The Time element is associated with manipulation of time itself, offering skills that can speed up allies or slow down enemies.

Tier 1.name: Time Slow
Tier 1.description: Slow down time for a specific target.
Tier 1.effect: Target receives a penalty to speed and reaction times.

Tier 2.name: Temporal Loop
Tier 2.description: Using Time and Light elements, create a loop that repeats actions.
Tier 2.effect: Allows an ally to repeat their last action.

Tier 3.name: Time Stop
Tier 3.description: Combining Time, Air, and Electricity elements, stop time for everyone but yourself.
Tier 3.effect: You get an extra turn while all others are frozen.
